column5: me and my family are currently staying at Indian Lake lodge on the Indian Lake Chain. we have been coming here for a number of years now and we love derek and cassy and everything about the place. the past few years the fishing has been getting better and better!!! we have found that it is extremely easy to catch fish and the quality of the fish have been getting better. we have caught more fish over 20 inches this year than ever!!! i think if MNR put a slot on the lake or if the camp owners worked together and made rules against bringing fish over 18 inches in, then the size would even get better!!!
